doc.title: Bayanin Mahadar Buɗe Tare da tsawo
doc.description:
Wannan tsawo yana ba ku damar sarrafa yadda ake buɗe hanyoyin haɗin yanar gizo da kyau.

Taga: sauran masu bincike, windows pop-up, sabbin windows, sabbin windows incognito, taga na yanzu (default)

>Shafukan: hagu na shafin na yanzu, shafin na yanzu, dama na shafin na yanzu (default)

Halin kunnawa: baya aiki, kunna nan da nan (default)
